name: Sleepy Ventures
description:
Platformer game where you try and return to your family. Controls are A & D to move left and right, as well as W to jump. This game was created for the UE4 Spring Game Jam 2019. Everything exept for the character sprites, coin, and SFX where created during the jam.

Jumping and Victory SFX from Retro 8-bit Sounds by Gamemaster Audio (UE4 marketplace)

Character Sprites from gameart2d.com

Coin from pngimage.com
